mapper.select:
select CM_KEY ckey, CM_ID cmid, CM_TYPE type, CM_SUB sub, CM_DATE day,
CM_AUNIT aunit, CM_APERSON aperson, CM_RDATE rday, CM_AREASON areason, CM_REMARK remark,
CM_ATTACHMENT attachment, CM_MODIFICATION_DATE mday, CM_MODIFICATION_PERSON mperson from GZCRM_CMRPR
mapper.insert: insert into GZCRM_CMRPR (CM_KEY, CM_ID, CM_TYPE, CM_SUB, CM_DATE, CM_AUNIT, CM_APERSON, CM_RDATE, CM_AREASON, CM_REMARK, CM_ATTACHMENT, CM_MODIFICATION_DATE, CM_MODIFICATION_PERSON) values (SEQ_KEY.NEXTVAL, #{cmid}, #{type}, #{sub}, #{day}, #{aunit}, #{aperson}, #{rday}, #{areason}, #{remark}, #{attachment}, sysdate, 'admin')
mapper.update: update GZCRM_CMRPR set CM_KEY= #{ckey}, CM_ID= #{cmid}, CM_TYPE= #{type}, CM_SUB= #{sub}, CM_DATE= #{day}, CM_AUNIT= #{aunit}, CM_APERSON= #{aperson}, CM_RDATE= #{rday}, CM_AREASON= #{areason}, CM_REMARK= #{remark}, CM_ATTACHMENT= #{attachment}, cm_modification_date = sysdate, cm_modification_person='admin' where CM_KEY = #{ckey}
mapper.select: select CM_KEY ckey, CM_ID cmid, CM_TYPE type, CM_SUB sub, to_char(CM_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') day, CM_AUNIT aunit, CM_APERSON aperson, to_char(CM_RDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') rday, CM_AREASON areason, CM_REMARK remark, CM_ATTACHMENT attachment from GZCRM_CMRPR where CM_KEY = #{ckey}
